localize.text: To work in an experiment with my favorite junior, I feel unstoppable, like a tiger given wings.
Don’t be so humble. You could have gone to any Wing you wanted.
But you chose this one, is it because of your trust in me?
Just wait, I’ll make sure you won’t regret your decision.
Look at this, everyone’s subconscious leads to death.
Everyone is forcibly locking away their own light and possibilities.
Here, this is the treatment I’ve told you about. The treatment for the soul.
Trust me, we’ve made a worthy first step.
I sincerely welcome you to this place.
